org.forgerock.openam.oauth2

Class StatelessRefreshToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.oauth2.StatelessToken
      • org.forgerock.openam.oauth2.StatelessRefreshToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntrospectableToken, RefreshToken, Token

    public class StatelessRefreshToken
extends StatelessToken
implements RefreshToken
    Models a stateless OpenAM OAuth2 refresh token.
